verbose_text: 8 The inhibitory action of LRF on chondrogenesis is in part due to its direct binding and suppression of the cartilage oligomeric matrix protein (COMP) promoter, thus negating the positive effects of Sox9 on COMP gene expression.
evidence: LRF on chondrogenesis is in part due to its direct binding and suppression of the cartilage oligomeric matrix protein (COMP) promoter, thus negating the positive effects of Sox9
